QuestData.Title: Preserving the Wilds
QuestData.Description:
The Wild Preserve is one of the few areas where proto-dragons thrive. But the Primalists are disrupting their nesting grounds by sending sorties to capture and experiment on proto-whelps and proto-drakes.
Show them no mercy. Locate these Primalist poachers, wipe them out, and free their captives. The proto-dragon species depends on it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free 5 Captured Proto-Whelps or Captured Proto-Drakes.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. The Primalists remain a threat, but these dragons enjoy their freedom once again.
